homepage.partThreeText: Discover my personal and professional projects, showcasing my passion for technological innovation.

sharedDrinks.title: SharedDrinks
sharedDrinks.description: A mobile application that provides drink recommendations and helps users find nearby bars using location services and cocktail APIs.
sharedDrinks.summary: A mobile app to get recommendations on drinks & nearby bars. Features include drink suggestions, bar locator with maps, and cocktail recipes powered by external APIs.

homepage.gameParagraph: Gluttony Eater is a combat game prototype developed with Unreal Engine 5, leveraging the latest rendering and physics technologies. You play as a fighter who consumes various foods to unlock contextual superpowers and advanced gameplay mechanics. Each food grants a unique temporary bonus â€” from explosive dashes to energy shields â€” creating a dynamic combo system and real-time resource management. The game uses custom shaders, UE5 particle effects, and modular architecture for combat systems.
homepage.gameBullet1: Dynamic Power System : Eat to power up and choose your strategic timing wisely.
homepage.gameBullet2: Advanced Contextual Mechanics : Situational skills based on food types (movement, defense, explosion) with UE5 visual effects.
homepage.gameBullet3: Modern Arcade Gameplay : Advanced particle effects, custom shaders, and ultra-responsive controls.

extensions.scribeDesc: Use AI to correct spelling mistakes in your emails
extensions.templatesDesc: Create templates to reply to your emails faster
extensions.impostorDesc: A small observation mini-game to pass the time
extensions.translateDesc: With the power of AI, the world opens to you
extensions.scribeLongDesc: Chrome extension that uses Google's artificial intelligence (Gemini) to automatically correct spelling and grammar in your emails. Simple to use with one click.
extensions.templatesLongDesc: Extension that allows you to create, manage and reuse professional email templates with smart variables. Guaranteed time savings for all your recurring emails.
extensions.translateLongDesc: Chrome extension to quickly translate and change the language of web pages. Simple and efficient interface for multilingual navigation.

chatbot.welcome: ðŸ‘‹ Hi! How can I help you?

qa1.question: My apprenticeship schedule?
qa1.answer: I'm in apprenticeship with a schedule of 3 weeks in company and 1 week in school.

qa2.question: What year am I in?
qa2.answer: I'm in my 3rd year at ESGI and I plan to go to master's in development.

qa3.question: What languages do I know?
qa3.answer: I mainly use JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Node.js, HTML, CSS, PHP (Laravel & Symfony), WordPress & Shopify and a bit of Go or Rust. And also Unreal Engine.

qa4.question: What projects do I work on?
qa4.answer: I work on Chrome extensions, React/Node apps, and AI integrations with Gemini. Or games on Unreal Engine 5 or web, feel free to ask me.

shareddrinks.description: Mobile application for drink recommendations and bar location
shareddrinks.longDescription: A complete mobile application developed with React Native that allows users to discover new bars and cocktails. Integration of cocktail APIs, geolocation services and personalized recommendation system.

starbucks.description: 3D Starbucks coffee simulator with crafting system and customer interactions
starbucks.longDescription: Immersive Starbucks coffee simulator developed with React, TypeScript and Three.js. 3D third-person view game with drink crafting system, inventory management, AI customers, and complete game interface. Optimized with Draco compression and low-poly models for optimal performance.

portfolio.description: Modern portfolio with advanced animations and responsive design
portfolio.longDescription: Personal portfolio developed with React, TypeScript and Framer Motion. Modern design with smooth animations, dark/light mode, and performance optimizations. Three.js integration for 3D elements.
